posts.post_title: FS: T205 Doc White "No Quotes" Polar Bear Variation **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale. These are all low to mid-grade cards, ranging from poor to VG/EX, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

*ALL CARDS SOLD. THANKS FOR LOOKING!*
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Final price drop on the remaining cards!  Nice higher grade Doc White "no quotes" Polar Bear variation still available.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
I'll take Doc.
PM sent.
Ben
